resources.string: New Apple iPhone 15 Plus. 48MP main camera with 2x Telephoto and up to 4x resolution. USB-C connector. All-day battery life up to 26hrs video playback. Safety features include Roadside Assistance and Emergency SOS via satellite, plus Crash Detection. Dynamic Island for alerts and Live Activities. Color-infused glass and aluminum design making it incredibly durable. A16 Bionic chip.
